verses.verse: Not <WH3808> unto us, O LORD,<WH3068> not<WH3808> unto us, but<WH3588> unto thy name<WH8034> give<WH5414> glory,<WH3519> for<WH5921> thy mercy,<WH2617> and for<WH5921> thy truth's<WH571> sake.
Wherefore <WH4100> should the heathen<WH1471> say,<WH559> Where<WH346> is now<WH4994> their God?<WH430>
But our God<WH430> is in the heavens:<WH8064> he hath done<WH6213> whatsoever<WH3605> <WH834> he hath pleased.<WH2654>
Their idols<WH6091> are silver<WH3701> and gold,<WH2091> the work<WH4639> of men's<WH120> hands.<WH3027>
They have mouths,<WH6310> but they speak<WH1696> not:<WH3808> eyes<WH5869> have they, but they see<WH7200> not: <WH3808>
They have ears,<WH241> but they hear<WH8085> not:<WH3808> noses<WH639> have they, but they smell<WH7306> not: <WH3808>
They have hands,<WH3027> but they handle<WH4184> not:<WH3808> feet<WH7272> have they, but they walk<WH1980> not:<WH3808> neither<WH3808> speak<WH1897> they through their throat.<WH1627>
They that make<WH6213> them are<WH1961> like unto them;<WH3644> so is every one<WH3605> that<WH834> trusteth<WH982> in them.
O Israel,<WH3478> trust<WH982> thou in the LORD:<WH3068> he<WH1931> is their help<WH5828> and their shield.<WH4043>
O house<WH1004> of Aaron,<WH175> trust<WH982> in the LORD:<WH3068> he<WH1931> is their help<WH5828> and their shield.<WH4043>
Ye that fear<WH3373> the LORD,<WH3068> trust<WH982> in the LORD:<WH3068> he<WH1931> is their help<WH5828> and their shield.<WH4043>

The LORD<WH3068> hath been mindful<WH2142> of us: he will bless<WH1288> us; he will bless<WH1288> <WH853> the house<WH1004> of Israel;<WH3478> he will bless<WH1288> <WH853> the house<WH1004> of Aaron.<WH175>
He will bless<WH1288> them that fear<WH3373> the LORD,<WH3068> both small<WH6996> and<WH5973> great.<WH1419>
The LORD<WH3068> shall increase you more and more,<WH3254> <WH5921> you and your children.<WH1121>
Ye <WH859> are blessed<WH1288> of the LORD<WH3068> which made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth.<WH776>
The heaven,<WH8064> even the heavens,<WH8064> are the LORD's:<WH3068> but the earth<WH776> hath he given<WH5414> to the children<WH1121> of men.<WH120>
The dead<WH4191> praise<WH1984> not<WH3808> the LORD,<WH3050> neither<WH3808> any<WH3605> that go down<WH3381> into silence.<WH1745>
But we<WH587> will bless<WH1288> the LORD<WH3050> from this time forth<WH4480> <WH6258> and forevermore.<WH5704> <WH5769> Praise<WH1984> the LORD.<WH3050>
